record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1905. Fifth row: John Frederick Tobin, Clarence Russell, Norman Barker, Robert Eddy Mathews, Walter McAvoy, and Raymond Leamore Quigley; fourth row: George Schobinger, Edwin Eugene, Parry James, Davies Lightbody, Sanford Avery Lyon, and Lloyd Heman Brown; third row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach); second row: Arthur W. Clark, William P. Hogenson, Hugo Morris Friend (captain), and Charles Herman Groman; first row: Louis Guy Wilkins, Ernest Eugene Quantrell, Frederick Adolph Speik, William Gorham Matthews, Burton Pike Gale, and Clyde Amel Blair.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photographer stamp and signature, mounted on board.
